description: QuantraBot pattern knowledge base fails to load, preventing chat functionality. DevBot for patterns unavailable.
commonCauses: Pattern knowledge JSON files missing from assets
JSON parsing error in knowledge files
solutions: Validate all pattern knowledge files exist in assets
Implement robust JSON parsing with error recovery
Use lazy loading for knowledge base
Provide fallback to minimal knowledge set
Log specific file causing load failure
prevention: Validate knowledge JSON files in build process
Test knowledge loading in instrumented tests
Version knowledge files and handle migrations
Test with all pattern knowledge files
